title: How to Set the Status of a LED Bar in Wio Link
content: API  [sourcecode language="python"]import requests  res = requests.post('https://host/v1/node/GroveLEDBarUART0/bits/0', headers = { 'Authorization': 'nodetoken' })  if res.ok:   print res.text[/sourcecode]  CLI  1) Configure the CLI:  [sourcecode language="text"]wio login[/sourcecode]  2) Run the following command:  [sourcecode language="text"]wio call nodetoken POST /v1/node/GroveLEDBarUART0/bits/0[/sourcecode]
contentWithMarkup: API [sourcecode language="python"]import requests res = requests.post('https://host/v1/node/GroveLEDBarUART0/bits/0', headers = { 'Authorization': 'nodetoken' }) if res.ok: print res.text[/sourcecode] CLI 1) Configure the CLI: [sourcecode language="text"]wio login[/sourcecode] 2) Run the following command: [sourcecode language="text"]wio call nodetoken POST /v1/node/GroveLEDBarUART0/bits/0[/sourcecode]
